text: Ahmad Akmad Batabol Usman (1974 - 3 May 2015), better known as Abdul Basit Usman, was a Filipino Islamist and fugitive. He was a bomb making expert who was head of the Special Operations Group of the Bangsamoro Islamic Freedom Fighters and had links with Abu Sayyaf and Jemaah Islamiyah groups. Usman was born in a village in Shariff Aguak, Maguindanao to a Muslim family. He worked as an Overseas Filipino Worker (OFW) in Pakistan before taking part in militant activities. Usman was killed on 3 May 2014 in Guindulungan, aged 40/41. ==References== Category:1974 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Deaths by firearm Category:Filipino activists Category:Muslims Category:Maguindanao del Sur
title: Abdul Basit Usman
